metadata.description:
Atelier Foils
W/ Kelebekler

# 1 / 7

Curiosity is ignited as young artists (aged 4-6) encounter abstract artworks presented solely for their expansive surfaces and as available canvases.

In this collaborative research workshop, the young artists embark on a journey of artistic exploration. They set out to test how different types of paint and tools interact with this newly introduced surface. The creative process quickly evolves as the previous artwork's negative space starts to shrink.

For these young researchers, it is their first time painting on a surface larger than themselves. With each stroke, these young artists enthusiastically embrace the opportunity to leave their mark.

*KELEBEKLER:
ADA FADİME KOÇ
ALİ TUNA AKKAN
ARAS GENÇ
BULUT ÜNVERDİ
CAN DEMİRCAN
ÇINAR ATA TÜRKMEN

EMİR KURT
